WRITING.TEXT: No one should be OK with this.

WRITING.TITLE: Miranda rights exception invoked for Boston Marathon bombing

WRITING.TEXT: Let's beat our chests and grunt while womenfolk bring us meat. Primate.

WRITING.TITLE: The anti-gun/anti-CISPA paradox in a nutshell

WRITING.TEXT: A knife is designed to kill just as a gun is. If you put a knife in your grandmothers hand, sliced bread. Put it in Ted Bundys, sliced teenager. Some could argue a gun is designed for target practice. It depends again on who is holding it.
